meanings.definition: To come together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The students teamed up to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The players teamed together to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The animals teamed up to outsmart the hunter.
meanings.sent4: The clouds teamed together to create a storm.
meanings.sent5: The superheroes teamed up to defeat the villain.

meanings.definition: To work together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The friends teamed to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The colleagues teamed on the project to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The ants teamed to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The waves teamed up to crash against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The robots teamed efficiently to complete the task.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The basketball team showed great teamwork as they played.
meanings.sent2: The medical team worked together to save the patient.
meanings.sent3: The team of chefs cooked up a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The team of firefighters rushed to put out the fire.
meanings.sent5: The team of astronauts trained for the space mission.
